product_name: Sony Action Cam Replacement Door Pack
long_description: The Sony Action Cam replacement door pack works in conjunction with the Action Cam waterproof case (sold separately), providing 2 door options-1 for deep underwater use and 1 for improved audio. Flat-faced door provides a secure seal and flat lens, ideal for underwater use down to 60m (197 ft.). The other door features a microphone opening for improved audio recording, and is waterproof down to 10m (33 ft.).
short_description: The Sony Action Cam replacement door pack works in conjunction with the Action Cam waterproof case (sold separately), providing 2 door options-1 for deep underwater use and 1 for improved audio.
